name: Funky City Escape
description:
FUNKY CITY ESCAPE

This is an endless runner where you are trying to skate as far as possible without dying. Along the way there are different robots that will try and kill you. Some robots you can dodge and some you can kill. The player can also kick the robots to destroy them. You will also need to make sure you jump between buildings.

INSTRUCTIONS:

Your goal is to skate as far as possible.

You can move right and left, jump, or slide to avoid these obstacles. You can also slam to get to the ground faster. 

If you don't think you can avoid a drone or billboard, you could instead kick it to destroy it.

You can speed up if you are up for the challenge. You will cover ground faster, but you will also encounter obstacles faster.

CONTROLS:

Move - A & D

Jump - Space

Slide/Slam - S

Kick - E

Speed Up - Q

Pause - Esc

CREDITS:

Caden F - Game Director (Art)

Gavin C - Tech Lead (Coding)

Pratyush K - Sound Design Lead (Music & Sound)
